title: Ep. 30 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: On this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave, Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer discuss Michael Jordan and "The Last Dance" documentary, dipping, and seeing Nirvana in concert. Bert issues an apology to people struggling with addiction, and the two of them debate the greatest all-time college football teams. Who's in YOUR top five? Let us know in the comment section below!
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
